Package com.nrifintech.cms.services

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.services.OrderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validator
@Service public class OrderService extends Object implements Validator
This class is used to add, get, update and delete orders

      Returns:

    • getOrder

      public Order getOrder​(Integer id)
      If the order exists, return it. If it doesn't, throw an exception
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the order you want to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The order object is being returned.

    • getServerEpoch

      public Boolean getServerEpoch​(Timestamp prev, Timestamp curr)
      If the difference between the current timestamp and the previous timestamp is less than or equal to the server limit, then return true
      Parameters:
      prev - The timestamp of the previous request
      curr - The current timestamp
      Returns:
      A Boolean value.

    • getOrderQuantity

      public Map<String,​UrlQuantity> getOrderQuantity​(Date date)
      It takes a date as input and returns a map of item names and their quantities ordered on that date
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which you want to get the order quantity.
      Returns:
      A map of the item name and the quantity of that item that was ordered on the given date.
